items.sentence: I hear that Tom and Mary have both dropped out of school.
Let\'s keep thinking about the best way to get this done.
Let\'s see how the negotiations pan out before we decide.
Mary is a good-looking girl, but she\'s not too friendly.
Mary is the only woman that I\'ve ever been in love with.
If Tom isn\'t careful, he\'s going to get himself killed.
If you didn\'t want to go, you should\'ve said something.
I\'m thinking of going to Boston with my wife next month.
We have to do something to stop Tom from hurting himself.
Don\'t ever forget how much stronger Tom is than you are.
